title: Climate Change is Bigger Existential Threat Than Nuclear Holocaust, Says Biden
description:
What's the bigger existential threat to humanity, climate change or nuclear holocaust? Biden says climate change, Trump disagrees. Richard Burcik looks at the facts.

The post Climate Change is Bigger Existential Threat Than Nuclear Holocaust, Says Biden appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: How Sweden Proved the World Wrong About Lockdown
description:
Two Swedish researchers from Lund University have shown once again that Sweden proves the world wrong about lockdown, publishing their research in the journal Economic Affairs.

The post How Sweden Proved the World Wrong About Lockdown appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Stonewall Funded Church of England Guidance that Said Primary Schoolchildren Can be Transgender
description:
Church of England guidance telling primary schools that children as young as five can be transgender was funded by Stonewall, it has emerged.

The post Stonewall Funded Church of England Guidance that Said Primary Schoolchildren Can be Transgender appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Mild Myocarditis Post-Vaccination Can Result in Sudden Death, Japanese Autopsy Finds
description:
Mild myocarditis following Covid vaccination can lead to sudden death from a fatal heart arrhythmia, a Japanese autopsy has found. But this would not be picked up by most autopsies as the relevant test is left out.

The post Mild Myocarditis Post-Vaccination Can Result in Sudden Death, Japanese Autopsy Finds appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: West End Play Stages Shows to All-Black Audience “Free From the White Gaze”
description:
A controversial West End theatre production about race, identity and sexuality in 21st century America will put on two nights for black-only audiences to watch the play "free from the white gaze".

The post West End Play Stages Shows to All-Black Audience “Free From the White Gaze” appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: Lee Anderson’s Critics Are Not Being Honest About Sadiq Khan’s Failure to Condemn the Antisemitism Flooding London’s Streets
description:
Lee Anderson's critics are not being honest about Sadiq Khan's failure to condemn the antisemitism flooding London's streets and why this particular racial prejudice gets a free pass in Khan's capital.

The post Lee Anderson’s Critics Are Not Being Honest About Sadiq Khan’s Failure to Condemn the Antisemitism Flooding London’s Streets appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.

title: News Round-Up
description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the virus and the vaccines, the ‘climate emergency’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
